Plot: Ruben and Robby are twin brothers, adopted by Mona, one of the wealthiest - and most eccentric - women in Santa Barbara. Ruben is devoted to Mona, but Robby is more devoted to her money. So...
Title: Steal Big Steal Little
Writer: Andrew Davis (story), Teresa Tucker-Davies (story), Frank Ray Perilli (story), Andrew Davis (screenplay), Lee Blessing (screenplay), Jeanne Blake (screenplay), Terry Kahn (screenplay)
Actors: Andy Garcia, Alan Arkin, Rachel Ticotin, Joe Pantoliano
